name: FairPlay configuration file
#logType:
One can specify type of log to print in this field. It takes additive values 
		of following to print combination of them. 
			Errors=1,
			Warnings=2,
			Notices=4,
			Debug=8
#logLevel:
One can specify level of log to print in this fild. It takes additive values of 
		following to print combination of them. 
			Main=1,
			Fstream_heart=2,
			ws_Server=4,
			http_server=8,
			fport=16

help.homeFolder: Its folder where FairPlay server looks for and stores all the data required.
help.port: Its the port on which FairPlay server runs.
help.bootup: set it to true if you want FairPlay to start at system start up else set to false.
help.internetTestURL: FairPlay pings this URL to test internet connectivity
help.corpNWGW: corporateNetworkGatway sets the gateway for this device
